entry.title: King Of Spice - Allspice Whole - 2.27 Kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: King of Spice
Type: FOOD
Price: 27.99

King Of Spice - Allspice Whole - 5 Lbs

Bulk Whole Spices Add Flavor to Your Favorite Food and Drink Recipes

Whole spices are loaded with flavor. They can be used whole for an aesthetically pleasing presentation or ground up just before use for added freshness.

Try adding this spice to salsa, guacamole, and taco or enchilada sauces for extra flavor, or allow guests to season their own meals via front-of-house condiment stations. Whether you run a Mexican or Indian restaurant, pizzeria, or upscale bistro, this spice is sure to take your food to the next level.

Its a pantry staple that can be used in marinades, tomato-based sauces, and soups. Whether you own a pizzeria, Italian restaurant, or upscale bistro, this spice is the perfect addition to all of your favorite menu items.

The unique and delicious flavor and aroma is commonly used in Asian, Middle Eastern, Latin American, and Italian cuisines. However, it also works well with traditional Canadian and American dishes.

The bulk pack of spices is a cost-efficient option for high-volume kitchens and can easily be portioned into smaller quantities. Dehydrated spices also last longer than fresh ingredients and are easier to store, making them the perfect addition to any busy, high-output kitchen.

entry.title: Belle Donne Spices - Everything Bagel Seasoning - 3 Kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: Belle Donne Spices
Type: FOOD
Price: 42.99

Belle Donne Spices - Everything Bagel Seasoning - 3Kg

Pre-made spice blends like herb blends, Cajun spice, and pumpkin spice create bold and memorable flavors in your dishes while cutting down on preparation time.

Add an extra zesty taste to your appetizers and entrees with this seasoning blend. Its savory combination of granulated garlic, onion, pepper, and spices will enhance many of your signature dishes. No matter what's on the menu, your customers will love the robust flavor of this Regal herbs and garlic blend.

Versatile Seasoning

Perfect for adding to meat rubs, sauces, and marinades, this blend will add some zest to tomato-based dishes, soups, and italian cuisine. Create a signature italian dressing by mixing this seasoning blend with vinegar and oil. You can also sprinkle it on pizza for a one-of-a-kind taste.

Saves Prep Time

Dehydrated spices retain many of the same nutritional benefits as fresh spices, while offering versatility and shortened kitchen prep time.

Pre-Blended

This convenient blend will also help to cut down on the amount of individual seasonings used in your recipes.

entry.title: Belle Donne Spices - Cinnamon Sugar - 865 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Belle Donne Spices
Type: FOOD
Price: 6.99

Belle Donne Spices - Cinnamon Sugar  - 865 g

Satisfy the sweet tooth of every guest with this Cinnamon sugar! 

Cinnamon sugar is great for use as a sweetener in baked items, as well as increases moisture retention. Use this high quality Cinnamon sugar to make muffins, coffee cakes, and irresistibly rich chocolate chip cookies in your bakery, diner, or cafe! It's also a sweet addition to baked beans or sweet potatoes. Use it in syrups, glazes, or sauces, or play up its crumbly nature by using it as a topping for oatmeal, yogurt, fruit, and cobblers.

Treat your patrons to the spicy-sweet blend of cinnamon and sugar in your breakfast items or desserts. Whichever way you use it, this cinnamon sugar gives your dishes a warming, sweet taste that your customers know and love. The supply makes the perfect addition to your diner, buffet, or bakery.

This gives the sugar its milder flavor with a subtle caramel undertone. From cooking to baking, to sprinkling atop pancakes or your warm apple pie, this Cinnamon sugar is sure to be an asset in your commercial kitchen!

The dried leaves of the Anethum Graveolens (family Umbelliferae) they are bright green and impart a pleasing flavour to mild or bland foods. Dill Weed is subtle and fresh in flavour; it is characterized by sweet, green/grassy, tea like and rye notes.
Use to season cheese, shrimp, cream soup, gazpacho, lamb, butter for fish, chicken, green beans and carrots. It is superb in creamed peas or fish sauces, sour cream and oil and vinegar dressing.

entry.title: Club House - Onion Granulated - 600 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Club House
Type: FOOD
Price: 12.99

Club House - Onion Granulated - 600 g

One of the most universal seasonings, onion has a pungency and bittersweet taste which can be mild or powerfully sharp. Granulated onion provides the full bodied aroma and pungent flavour of onion in a convenient granulated powder.
Use on all meats, fish, shellfish and poutlry. 1 tbsp (15 mL) is equivalent to one medium sized fresh onion. Use wherever onion flavour is required without the appearance or texture of onion particles.

The dried seed of the herb Cuminum cyminum and a member of the Parsley family, Cumin is yellowish brown seeds and has a very penetrating, earthy, slightly bitter flavour. A key component in both Chili Powder and Curry Powder.
The flavour of Cumin plays a major role in Mexican, Thai, Vietnamese and Indian cuisines. Cumin is a critical ingredient of chili powder and is found in achiote blends, adobos, garam masala, curry powder, and baharat. Use in Mexican dishes such as fajitas and tacos, in Middle Eastern dishes such as falafels and couscous.

Allspice is generally described as having a woody, cinnamon like flavour, which is slightly numbing. The flavour suggests a blend of cinnamon, nutmeg, and cloves. Allspice is the dried, unripened fruit of Pimenta Officinalis Lindl, a small evergreen tree of the myrtle family. The fruit is a pea sized berry, sun dried to a reddish brown colour.

The bulk pack of spices is a cost-efficient option for high-volume kitchens and can easily be portioned into smaller quantities. Dehydrated spices also last longer than fresh ingredients and are easier to store, making them the perfect addition to any busy, high-output kitchen.

Thyme or fully known as Thymus vulagaris is a low growing herbaceous plant, sometimes becoming somewhat woody. Thyme has a mighty flavour and armoa courtesy of the tindy dark green leaves. The leaves are known for their spicy and resinous aroma which add a distinctive aromatic flavoring to sauces, stews, stuffings, meats, poultry – almost anything from soup to salad.
Thyme is used in flavouring chowder, meats, sausage, cottage cheese, creamed chipped beef, creamed chicken, Creole seafood dishes, poultry dressing, tomatoes, marinades, vegetables, fish, and cheese dishes. Thyme butter is good over creamed white onions, asparagus, green beans and eggplant. Use in stews, soups and jerk blends. 1/4 tsp (1 mL) is equivalent to 1 tbsp (15 mL) fresh chopped thyme leaves. Ground spices should be added just prior to the end of cooking time, as they release their flavour quickly.
